aboutpage.title: About
aboutpage.intro: We aim to be one of the best in the sector by prioritising quality service and customer satisfaction.
aboutpage.whoWeAreText: Founded in 1983 in Nev≈üehir and started its activities in the turning sector. In a short time, it made a very rapid development and turned to the field of agricultural machinery and started the production of potato planting and dismantling machines. Later on, the company expanded its product range and started to produce agricultural machinery such as Patoz Machine, Baler, Trailer, Sunflower and Corn Table, which are mainly used in the threshing-harvesting group. Today, our professional team, with 40 years of experience in the field of agricultural equipment, continuously developing and advancing performance and production, has a 2000 m2 closed area and provides service in an 8000 m2 open area. Our company has ISO 9001: 2015, ISO 14001: 2015, ISO/IEC 27001: 2013, ISO 45001: 2018 Quality Management System certifications and has secured its products and services.
aboutpage.visionText: We aim to be a company that offers the best service in the sector and provides sustainable growth. We shape the future with our innovative approach and strong values
